{{< include _symbols.qmd >}} ```{r require_tidyverse, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE} library(tidyverse) library(ggforce) library(latex2exp) theme_set(theme_bw()) ``` ## Степени и корни {#formulas_power} ### Определения {#formulas_power_def} $$ a^b \def \prod_{i=1}^b a_i $$ $$ \sqrt[n]a \def b \Leftrightarrow b^n = a $$ ### Свойства {#formulas_power_identities}
$$a^n \cdot a^m = a^{n+m}$$ $$\frac{a^n}{a^m} = a^{n-m}$$ $$(a^n)^m = a^{nm}$$ $$a^0 = 1$$ $$a^{-n}=\frac{1}{a^n}$$ $$(a \cdot b)^n = a^n \cdot b^n$$ $$\Big(\frac{a}{b}\Big)^n = \frac{a^n}{b^n}$$ $$a^{\frac{1}{n}}=\sqrt[n]{a}$$ $$a^{\frac{m}{n}}=\sqrt[n]{a^m}$$ $$\sqrt[n]{a \cdot b} = \sqrt[n]{a} \cdot \sqrt[n]{b}$$ $$(a \cdot b)^{\frac{1}{n}} = a^{\frac{1}{n}} \cdot b^{\frac{1}{n}}$$ $$\sqrt[n]{\frac{a}{b}} = \frac{\sqrt[n]{a}}{\sqrt[n]{b}}$$ $$\Big(\frac{a}{b}\Big)^{\frac{1}{n}} = \frac{a^{\frac{1}{n}}}{b^{\frac{1}{n}}}$$
$$ x^n = a \Rightarrow x = \begin{cases} \pm \sqrt[n]{a}, &\quad x \mod 2 = 0 \\ \sqrt[n]{a}, &\quad x \mod 2 = 1 \end{cases} $$ ## Логарифмы {#formulas_log} ### Определение {#formulas_log_def} $$\log_b a \def c \Leftrightarrow a^c = b, a > 0, b > 0, b \neq 1$$ ### Свойства {#formulas_log_identities}
$$\log_a a = 1$$ $$\log_c(ab) = \log_c a + \log_c b$$ $$\log_c\Big(\frac{a}{b}\Big) = \log_c a - \log_c b$$ $$\log_c 1 = 0$$ $$\log_c a^b = b \log_c a$$ $$\log_{c^b} a = \frac{1}{b} \log_c a$$
## Модуль {#formulas_abs} $$ |a| = \begin{cases} a, &a \geq 0 \\ -a, &a < 0 \end{cases} $$ $$|x| \leq a \Rightarrow -a \leq x \leq a \Leftrightarrow x \in [-a, a]$$ $$|x| \geq a \Rightarrow x \leq -a \wedge x \geq a \Leftrightarrow x \in (-\infty, -a] \cup [a, +\infty)$$ ## Тригонометрия {#formulas_trig} ```{r trig_circle, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE} # set angle phi1 <- pi / 5 # create data (start and end points of lines) tibble( func = factor(rep( c("sin", "cos", "sec", "csc", "tan", "cot"), each = 2 ), ordered = TRUE, levels = c("sin", "cos", "sec", "csc", "tan", "cot")), point = rep(c("start", "end"), times = 6), x = c(cos(phi1), cos(phi1), 0, cos(phi1), 0, 1, 0, 0, 1, 1, 0, cos(phi1)), y = c(0, sin(phi1), 0, 0, 0, tan(phi1), 0, 1 / sin(phi1), 0, tan(phi1), 1 / sin(phi1), sin(phi1) ) ) |> # plot ggplot() + # axes geom_vline(xintercept = 0, color = "gray") + geom_hline(yintercept = 0, color = "gray") + # circle geom_circle(aes(x0 = 0, y0 = 0, r = 1)) + # radius vector geom_line(data = tibble(x = c(0, cos(phi1)), y = c(0, sin(phi1))), aes(x, y)) + geom_arc(aes(x0 = 0, y0 = 0, r = .25, start = 3*pi/6-phi1, end = 3*pi/6)) + # trig funs geom_line(aes(x = x, y = y, color = func), linewidth = 1) + # point geom_point(data = tibble(x = cos(phi1), y = sin(phi1)), aes(x, y)) + # create grid scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(-1, 1, by = .5)) + scale_y_continuous(breaks = seq(-1, 3, by = .5)) + # fix proportions coord_fixed(xlim = c(-1, 1), ylim = c(-1, 1.75) ) + labs(x = NULL, y = NULL, color = NULL) + theme(legend.position = "bottom") + # set colors scale_color_manual( values = c( sin = "salmon", cos = "royalblue", csc = "orchid", sec = "turquoise", tan = "tan4", cot = "orange2" ) ) -> acute # set angle phi2 <- 4.5 * pi / 5.5 # create data (start and end points of lines) tibble( func = factor(rep( c("sin", "cos", "sec", "csc", "tan", "cot"), each = 2 ), ordered = TRUE, levels = c("sin", "cos", "sec", "csc", "tan", "cot")), point = rep(c("start", "end"), times = 6), x = c(cos(phi2), cos(phi2), 0, cos(phi2), 0, 1, 0, 0, 1, 1, 0, cos(phi2)), y = c(0, sin(phi2), 0, 0, 0, tan(phi2), 0, 1 / sin(phi2), 0, tan(phi2), 1 / sin(phi2), sin(phi2) ) ) |> # plot ggplot() + # axes geom_vline(xintercept = 0, color = "gray") + geom_hline(yintercept = 0, color = "gray") + # circle geom_circle(aes(x0 = 0, y0 = 0, r = 1)) + # radius vector geom_line(data = tibble(x = c(0, cos(phi2)), y = c(0, sin(phi2))), aes(x, y)) + geom_arc(aes(x0 = 0, y0 = 0, r = .25, start = 3*pi/6-phi2, end = 3*pi/6)) + # trig funs geom_line(aes(x = x, y = y, color = func), linewidth = 1) + # point geom_point(data = tibble(x = cos(phi2), y = sin(phi2)), aes(x, y)) + # create grid scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(-1, 1, by = .5)) + scale_y_continuous(breaks = seq(-1, 3, by = .5)) + # fix proportions coord_fixed(xlim = c(-1, 1), ylim = c(-1, 1.75) ) + labs(x = NULL, y = NULL, color = NULL) + theme(legend.position = "bottom") + # set colors scale_color_manual( values = c( sin = "salmon", cos = "royalblue", csc = "orchid", sec = "turquoise", tan = "tan4", cot = "orange2" ) ) -> obtuse gridExtra::grid.arrange(acute, obtuse, ncol=2) ``` ### Производные тригонометрические функции {#trig_funs_def} $$ \sec \alpha = \frac{1}{\cos \alpha} \qquad \csc \alpha = \frac{1}{\sin \alpha} \qquad \tan \alpha = \frac{\sin \alpha}{\cos \alpha} \qquad \cot \alpha = \frac{\cos \alpha}{\sin \alpha} $$ ### Основное тригонометрическое тождество {#trig_pythagorean_identities} $$ \sin^2 \alpha + \cos^2 \alpha = 1 $$ $$ \sin \alpha = \pm \sqrt{1 - \cos^2 \alpha} \qquad \cos \alpha = \pm \sqrt{1 - \sin^2 \alpha} $$ $$ 1 + \cot^2 \alpha = \csc^2 \alpha \qquad \tan^2 \alpha + 1 = \sec ^2 \alpha $$ $$ \sec^2 \alpha + \csc^2 \alpha = \sec^2 \alpha \cdot \csc^2 \alpha $$ ### Отражения {#trig_reflections} ```{r trig_reflections_circle, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE} x = cos(pi/6); y = sin(pi/6) clrs = c('red3', 'orange3', 'green3', 'blue3', 'purple3') label_shift = 0.12 ggplot() + # axes geom_vline(xintercept = 0, color = "gray") + geom_hline(yintercept = 0, color = "gray") + # zero phi annotate(geom = "text", x = 1.125, y = 0.1, label = TeX(r"($\varphi = 0$)"), color = "gray") + # circle geom_circle(aes(x0 = 0, y0 = 0, r = 1)) + # angle / red geom_line(aes(x = c(0, x), y = c(0, y)), color = clrs[1]) + geom_point(aes(x = x, y = y), color = clrs[1]) + annotate(geom = "text", x = x+label_shift, y = y+label_shift, label = TeX(r"($(x, y)$)"), color = clrs[1]) + # orange geom_abline(intercept = 0, slope = tan(pi/4), linetype = "dashed", color = clrs[2], linewidth = .2) + annotate(geom = "text", x = .875, y = 1.125, label = TeX(r"($\varphi = \frac{\pi}{4}$)"), color = clrs[2]) + geom_line(aes(x = c(0, y), y = c(0, x)), color = clrs[2]) + geom_point(aes(x = y, y = x), color = clrs[2]) + annotate(geom = "text", x = y+label_shift, y = x+label_shift, label = TeX(r"($(y, x)$)"), color = clrs[2]) + # green geom_vline(xintercept = 0, linetype = "dashed", color = clrs[3], linewidth = .2) + annotate(geom = "text", x = .125, y = 1.125, label = TeX(r"($\varphi = \frac{\pi}{2}$)"), color = clrs[3]) + geom_line(aes(x = c(0, -x), y = c(0, y)), color = clrs[3]) + geom_point(aes(x = -x, y = y), color = clrs[3]) + annotate(geom = "text", x = -x-label_shift*1.3, y = y+label_shift, label = TeX(r"($(-x, y)$)"), color = clrs[3]) + # blue geom_abline(intercept = 0, slope = tan(3*pi/4), linetype = "dashed", color = clrs[4], linewidth = .2) + annotate(geom = "text", x = -.875, y = 1.125, label = TeX(r"($\varphi = \frac{3\pi}{4}$)"), color = clrs[4]) + geom_line(aes(x = c(0, -y), y = c(0, -x)), color = clrs[4]) + geom_point(aes(x = -y, y = -x), color = clrs[4]) + annotate(geom = "text", x = -y-label_shift, y = -x-label_shift, label = TeX(r"($(-y, -x)$)"), color = clrs[4]) + # purple geom_hline(yintercept = 0, linetype = "dashed", color = clrs[5], linewidth = .2) + annotate(geom = "text", x = -1.125, y = 0.1, label = TeX(r"($\varphi = \pi$)"), color = clrs[5]) + geom_line(aes(x = c(0, x), y = c(0, -y)), color = clrs[5]) + geom_point(aes(x = x, y = -y), color = clrs[5]) + annotate(geom = "text", x = x+label_shift, y = -y-label_shift, label = TeX(r"($(x, -y)$)"), color = clrs[5]) + # arcs # gray geom_arc(aes(x0 = 0, y0 = 0, r = .25, start = 3*pi/6, end = 4*pi/6 ), color = "gray", linetype = "dotted") + annotate(geom = "text", x = .165, y = -.05, label = TeX(r"($-\alpha$)"), color = "gray") + # red geom_arc(aes(x0 = 0, y0 = 0, r = .25, start = 2*pi/6, end = 3*pi/6 ), color = clrs[1], linetype = "dotted") + annotate(geom = "text", x = .165, y = .05, label = TeX(r"($\alpha$)"), color = clrs[1]) + # orange geom_arc(aes(x0 = 0, y0 = 0, r = .35, start = pi/6, end = 3*pi/6 ), color = clrs[2], linetype = "dotted") + annotate(geom = "text", x = .25, y = .8, label = TeX(r"($\frac{\pi}{2} - \alpha$)"), color = clrs[2]) + # green geom_arc(aes(x0 = 0, y0 = 0, r = .45, start = -2*pi/6, end = 3*pi/6 ), color = clrs[3], linetype = "dotted") + annotate(geom = "text", x = -.8, y = .3, label = TeX(r"($\pi - \alpha$)"), color = clrs[3]) + # blue geom_arc(aes(x0 = 0, y0 = 0, r = .55, start = -5*pi/6, end = 3*pi/6), color = clrs[4], linetype = "dotted") + annotate(geom = "text", x = -.2, y = -.8, label = TeX(r"($\frac{3\pi}{2} - \alpha$)"), color = clrs[4]) + # purple geom_arc(aes(x0=0, y0=0, r = .65, start = -8*pi/6, end = 3*pi/6), color = clrs[5], linetype = "dotted") + annotate(geom = "text", x = .75, y = -.25, label = TeX(r"($2\pi - \alpha$)"), color = clrs[5]) + coord_fixed(xlim=c(-1.2, 1.2), ylim=c(-1.2, 1.2)) + labs(x = NULL, y = NULL) ``` #### Относительно $\varphi = 0$ {#trig_reflections_0} Выражает свойство чётности функции[^trig_odd_even_funs]. [^trig_odd_even_funs]: Функция называется *чётной*, если $f(-x) = f(x)$, и нечётной, если $f(-x) = -f(x)$.
$$\sin (-\alpha) = -\sin \alpha$$ $$\tan (-\alpha) = -\tan \alpha$$ $$\sec (-\alpha) = \sec \alpha$$ $$\cos (-\alpha) = \cos \alpha$$ $$\cot (-\alpha) = -\cot \alpha$$ $$\csc (-\alpha) = -\csc \alpha$$
#### Относительно $\varphi = \frac{\pi}{4}$ {#trig_reflections_pi4}
$$\sin (\frac{\pi}{2}-\alpha) = \cos \alpha$$ $$\tan \Big(\frac{\pi}{2}-\alpha\Big) = \cot \alpha$$ $$\sec \Big(\frac{\pi}{2}-\alpha\Big) = \csc \alpha$$ $$\cos \Big(\frac{\pi}{2}-\alpha\Big) = \sin \alpha$$ $$\cot \Big(\frac{\pi}{2}-\alpha\Big) = \tan \alpha$$ $$\csc \Big(\frac{\pi}{2}-\alpha\Big) = \sec \alpha$$
#### Относительно $\varphi = \frac{\pi}{2}$ {#trig_reflections_pi2}
$$\sin (\pi-\alpha) = \sin \alpha$$ $$\tan (\pi-\alpha) = -\tan \alpha$$ $$\sec (\pi-\alpha) = -\sec \alpha$$ $$\cos (\pi-\alpha) = -\cos \alpha$$ $$\cot (\pi-\alpha) = -\cot \alpha$$ $$\csc (\pi-\alpha) = \csc \alpha$$
#### Относительно $\varphi = \frac{3\pi}{4}$ {#trig_reflections_3pi2}
$$\sin \Big(\frac{3\pi}{2}-\alpha\Big) = -\cos \alpha$$ $$\tan \Big(\frac{3\pi}{2}-\alpha\Big) = \cot \alpha$$ $$\sec \Big(\frac{3\pi}{2}-\alpha\Big) = -\csc \alpha$$ $$\cos \Big(\frac{3\pi}{2}-\alpha\Big) = -\sin \alpha$$ $$\cot \Big(\frac{3\pi}{2}-\alpha\Big) = \tan \alpha$$ $$\csc \Big(\frac{3\pi}{2}-\alpha\Big) = -\sec \alpha$$
#### Относительно $\varphi = \pi$ {#trig_reflections_pi}
$$\sin (2\pi - \alpha) = -\sin \alpha = \sin (-\alpha)$$ $$\tan (2\pi - \alpha) = -\tan \alpha = \tan (-\alpha)$$ $$\sec (2\pi - \alpha) = \sec \alpha = \sec (-\alpha)$$ $$\cos (2\pi - \alpha) = \cos \alpha = \cos (-\alpha)$$ $$\cot (2\pi - \alpha) = -\cot \alpha = \cot (-\alpha)$$ $$\csc (2\pi - \alpha) = -\csc \alpha = \csc (-\alpha)$$
### Сдвиг {#trig_shift} ```{r trig_shift_circle, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE} x = cos(pi/6); y = sin(pi/6) clrs = c('red3', 'orange3', 'green3', 'blue3', 'purple3') label_shift = 0.12 ggplot() + geom_vline(xintercept = 0, color = "gray") + geom_hline(yintercept = 0, color = "gray") + geom_circle(aes(x0 = 0, y0 = 0, r = 1)) + geom_line(aes(x = c(0, x), y = c(0, y)), color = clrs[1]) + geom_point(aes(x = x, y = y), color = clrs[1]) + annotate(geom = "text", x = x+label_shift, y = y+label_shift, label = TeX(r"($(x, y)$)"), color = clrs[1]) + geom_line(aes(x = c(0, -x), y = c(0, y)), color = clrs[2]) + geom_point(aes(x = -x, y = y), color = clrs[2]) + annotate(geom = "text", x = -x-label_shift, y = y+label_shift, label = TeX(r"($(-x, y)$)"), color = clrs[2]) + geom_line(aes(x = c(0, -x), y = c(0, -y)), color = clrs[3]) + geom_point(aes(x = -x, y = -y), color = clrs[3]) + annotate(geom = "text", x = -x-label_shift, y = -y-label_shift, label = TeX(r"($(-x, -y)$)"), color = clrs[3]) + geom_line(aes(x = c(0, x), y = c(0, -y)), color = clrs[4]) + geom_point(aes(x = x, y = -y), color = clrs[4]) + annotate(geom = "text", x = x+label_shift, y = -y-label_shift, label = TeX(r"($(x, -y)$)"), color = clrs[4]) + annotate(geom = "text", x = x+1.4*label_shift, y = y-.4*label_shift, label = TeX(r"($(x, y)$)"), color = clrs[5]) + geom_arc(aes(x0 = 0, y0 = 0, r = .25, start = 2*pi/6, end = 3*pi/6 ), color = clrs[1], linetype = "dotted") + annotate(geom = "text", x = .165, y = .05, label = TeX(r"($\alpha$)"), color = clrs[1]) + geom_arc(aes(x0 = 0, y0 = 0, r = .35, start = -2*pi/6, end = 3*pi/6 ), color = clrs[2], linetype = "dotted") + annotate(geom = "text", x = -.125, y = .2, label = TeX(r"($\alpha + \frac{\pi}{2}$)"), color = clrs[2]) + geom_arc(aes(x0 = 0, y0 = 0, r = .45, start = -4*pi/6, end = 3*pi/6 ), color = clrs[3], linetype = "dotted") + annotate(geom = "text", x = -.3, y = -.05, label = TeX(r"($\alpha + \pi$)"), color = clrs[3]) + geom_arc(aes(x0 = 0, y0 = 0, r = .55, start = -8*pi/6, end = 3*pi/6 ), color = clrs[4], linetype = "dotted") + annotate(geom = "text", x = .2, y = -.3, label = TeX(r"($\alpha + \frac{3\pi}{2}$)"), color = clrs[4]) + geom_circle(aes(x0=0, y0=0, r = .65), color = clrs[5], linetype = "dotted") + annotate(geom = "text", x = .75, y = .3, label = TeX(r"($\alpha + 2\pi$)"), color = clrs[5]) + coord_fixed(xlim=c(-1.2, 1.2)) + labs(x = NULL, y = NULL) ``` ```{r trig_shift_graphs, echo=FALSE} tibble(x = seq(-5, 5, by = 0.001), sin = sin(x), cos = cos(x), sec = ifelse(abs(cos) < 1e-3, NA, 1/cos), csc = ifelse(abs(sin) < 1e-3, NA, 1/sin), tan = ifelse(abs(cos) < 1e-3, NA, sin/cos), cot = ifelse(abs(sin) < 1e-3, NA, cos/sin)) |> # summarise(min(abs(sin)), min(abs(cos))) pivot_longer(cols = -x) |> mutate(name = factor(name, ordered = TRUE, levels = c("sin", "cos", "csc", "sec", "tan", "cot"))) -> graphs ggplot(data = graphs, aes(x)) + geom_vline(xintercept = 0, color = "gray") + geom_hline(yintercept = 0, color = "gray") + geom_line(aes(y = value, color = name)) + facet_wrap(~ name, nrow = 3) + xlim(-5, 5) + coord_fixed(ylim = c(-3, 3)) + guides(color = "none") + labs(y = NULL, x = TeX("\\alpha, rad")) + scale_color_manual(values = c(sin = "salmon", cos = "royalblue", csc = "orchid", sec = "turquoise", tan = "tan4", cot = "orange2")) ``` Так как все тригонометрические функции периодические, результат сдвига функции определяется её периодом. Для функций $\sin, \cos, \sec$ и $\csc$ период равен $2\pi$. Для $\tan$ и $\cot$ он составляет $\pi$. #### На четверть периода {#trig_shift_by_one_quarter}
$$\sin \Big(\alpha \pm \frac{\pi}{2}\Big) = \pm\cos \alpha$$ $$\tan \Big(\alpha \pm \frac{\pi}{4}\Big) = \frac{\tan \alpha \pm 1}{1 \mp \tan \alpha}$$ $$\sec \Big(\alpha \pm \frac{\pi}{2}\Big) = \mp \csc \alpha$$ $$\cos \Big(\alpha \pm \frac{\pi}{2}\Big) = \mp \sin \alpha$$ $$\cot \Big(\alpha \pm \frac{\pi}{4}\Big) = \frac{\cot \alpha \mp 1}{1 \pm \cot \alpha}$$ $$\csc \Big(\alpha \pm \frac{\pi}{2}\Big) = \pm \sec \alpha$$
#### На половину периода {#trig_shift_by_half}
$$\sin (\alpha + \pi) = -\sin \alpha$$ $$\tan \Big(\alpha + \frac{\pi}{2}\Big) = -\cot \alpha$$ $$\sec (\alpha + \pi) = -\sec \alpha$$ $$\cos (\alpha + \pi) = -\cos \alpha$$ $$\cot \Big(\alpha + \frac{\pi}{2}\Big) = -\tan \alpha$$ $$\csc (\alpha + \pi) = -\csc \alpha$$
#### На полный период {#trig_shift_by_full}
$$\sin (\alpha + 2\pi) = \sin \alpha$$ $$\tan (\alpha + \pi) = \tan \alpha$$ $$\sec (\alpha + 2\pi) = \sec \alpha$$ $$\cos (\alpha + 2\pi) = \cos \alpha$$ $$\cot (\alpha + \pi) = \cot \alpha$$ $$\csc (\alpha + 2\pi) = \csc \alpha$$
### Соотношение знаков {#trig_sgn} $$ \sgn \sin \alpha = \sgn \csc \alpha \qquad \sgn \cos \alpha = \sgn \sec \alpha $$ $$ \sgn \tan \alpha = \sgn \cot \alpha $$ ### Функции суммы с разности аргументов {#trig_angle_sum} $$ \sin (\alpha \pm \beta) = \sin \alpha \cos \beta \pm \cos \alpha \sin \beta $$ $$ \cos (\alpha \pm \beta) = \cos \alpha \cos \beta \mp \sin \alpha \sin \beta $$ $$ \tan (\alpha \pm \beta) = \frac{\tan \alpha \pm \tan \beta}{1 \mp \tan \alpha \tan \beta} $$ $$ \cot (\alpha \pm \beta) = \frac{\cot \alpha \cot \beta \mp 1}{\cot \beta \pm \cot \alpha} $$ $$ \sec (\alpha \pm \beta) = \frac{\sec \alpha \sec \beta \csc \alpha \csc \beta}{\csc \alpha \csc \beta \mp \sec \alpha \sec \beta} $$ $$ \csc (\alpha \pm \beta) = \frac{\sec \alpha \sec \beta \csc \alpha \csc \beta}{\sec \alpha \csc \beta \pm \sec \alpha \sec \beta} $$ ### Формулы двойного аргумента {#trig_double_arg} $$ \sin 2\alpha = 2\sin \alpha \cos \alpha = (\sin \alpha + \cos \alpha)^2 -1 = \frac{2\tan \alpha}{1 + \tan^2 \alpha} $$ $$ \cos 2\alpha = \cos^2 \alpha - \sin^2 \alpha = 2\cos^2 \alpha - 1 = 1 - 2\sin^2 \alpha = \frac{1 - \tan^2 \alpha}{1 + \tan^2 \alpha} $$ $$ \tan 2\alpha = \frac{2\tan \alpha}{1 - \tan^2 \alpha} $$ $$ \cot 2\alpha = \frac{\cot^2 \alpha - 1}{2 \cot \alpha} = \frac{1 - \tan^2 \alpha}{2 \tan \alpha} $$ $$ \sec 2\alpha = \frac{\sec^2 \alpha}{2 - \sec^2 \alpha} = \frac{1 + \tan^2 \alpha}{1 - \tan^2 \alpha} $$ $$ \csc 2\alpha = \frac{\sec \alpha \csc \alpha}{2} = \frac{1 + \tan^2 \alpha}{2 \tan \alpha} $$ ### Формулы тройного аргумента {#trig_triple_arg} $$ \sin 3\alpha = 3\sin \alpha - 4 \sin^3 \alpha = 4\sin \alpha \sin \Big( \frac{\pi}{3} - \alpha\Big) \sin \Big( \frac{\pi}{3} + \alpha \Big) $$ $$ \cos 3\alpha = 4\cos^3 \alpha - 3 \cos \alpha = 4\cos \alpha \cos \Big(\frac{\pi}{3} - \alpha\Big) \cos \Big(\frac{\pi}{3} + \alpha\Big) $$ $$ \tan 3\alpha = \frac{3\tan \alpha - \tan^3 \alpha}{1 - 3\tan^2 \alpha} = \tan \alpha \tan \Big( \frac{\pi}{3} - \alpha \Big) \tan \Big(\frac{\pi}{3} + \alpha \Big) $$ $$ \cot 3\alpha = \frac{3 \cot \alpha - \cot^3 \alpha}{1 - 3\cot^2 \alpha} $$ $$ \sec 3\alpha = \frac{\sec^3 \alpha}{4 - 3\sec^2 \alpha} $$ $$ \csc 3\alpha = \frac{\csc^3 \alpha}{3\csc^2 \alpha -4} $$ ### Формулы половинного аргумента {#trig_half_arg} $$ \sin \frac{\alpha}{2} = \sgn \Big(\sin \frac{\alpha}{2} \Big) \sqrt{\frac{1 - \cos \alpha}{2}} $$ $$ \cos \frac{\alpha}{2} = \sgn \Big( \cos \frac{\alpha}{2} \Big) \sqrt{\frac{1 + \cos \alpha}{2}} $$ $$ \tan \frac{\alpha}{2} = \frac{1 - \cos\alpha}{\sin \alpha} = \frac{\sin \alpha}{1 + \cos \alpha} = \csc \alpha - \cot \alpha = \frac{\tan \alpha}{1 + \sec \alpha} = \sgn (\sin \alpha) \sqrt{\frac{1 - \cos \alpha}{1 + \cos \alpha}} $$ $$ \cot \frac{\alpha}{2} = \frac{1 + \cos \alpha}{\sin \alpha} = \frac{\sin \alpha}{1 - \cos \alpha} = \csc \alpha + \cot \alpha = \sgn(\sin \alpha) \sqrt{\frac{1 + \cos \alpha}{1 - \cos{\alpha}}} $$ $$ \sec \frac{\alpha}{2} = \sgn \Big( \cos \frac{\alpha}{2} \Big) \sqrt{\frac{2}{1 + \cos \alpha}} $$ $$ \csc \frac{\alpha}{2} = \sgn \Big( \sin \frac{\alpha}{2} \Big) \sqrt{\frac{2}{1 - \cos \alpha}} $$ ### Формулы понижения степени {#trig_power_reduction}
$$ \sin^2 \alpha = \frac{1 - \cos 2\alpha}{2} $$ $$ \cos^2 \alpha = \frac{1 + \cos 2\alpha}{2} $$
$$ \tan^2 \alpha = \frac{1 - \cos 2\alpha}{1 + \cos 2\alpha} $$ $$ \cot^2 \alpha = \frac{1 + \cos 2\alpha}{1 - \cos 2\alpha} $$
$$ \sec^2 \alpha = \frac{2}{1 + \cos 2\alpha} $$ $$ \csc^2 \alpha = \frac{2}{1 - \cos 2\alpha} $$
### Преобразование произведения в сумму {#trig_prod_to_sum} $$ \cos \alpha \cos \beta = \frac{\cos (\alpha - \beta) + \cos (\alpha + \beta)}{2} $$ $$ \sin \alpha \sin \beta = \frac{\cos (\alpha - \beta) - \cos (\alpha + \beta)}{2} $$ $$ \sin \alpha \cos \beta = \frac{\sin (\alpha + \beta) + \sin (\alpha - \beta)}{2} $$ $$ \cos \alpha \sin \beta = \frac{\sin (\alpha + \beta) - \sin (\alpha - \beta)}{2} $$ $$ \tan \alpha \tan \beta = \frac{\cos (\alpha - \beta) - \cos (\alpha + \beta)}{\cos (\alpha - \beta) + \cos (\alpha + \beta)} $$ $$ \tan \alpha \cot \beta = \frac{\sin (\alpha + \beta) + \sin (\alpha - \beta)}{\sin (\alpha + \beta) - \sin (\alpha - \beta)} $$ ### Преобразование суммы в произведение {#trig_sum_to_prod} $$ \sin \alpha \pm \sin \beta = 2 \sin \Big(\frac{\alpha \pm \beta}{2}\Big) \cos \Big(\frac{\alpha \mp \beta}{2}\Big) $$ $$ \cos \alpha + \cos \beta = 2 \cos \Big(\frac{\alpha + \beta}{2}\Big) \cos \Big(\frac{\alpha - \beta}{2}\Big) $$ $$ \cos \alpha - \cos \beta = -2 \sin \Big(\frac{\alpha + \beta}{2}\Big) \sin \Big(\frac{\alpha - \beta}{2}\Big) $$ $$ \tan \alpha \pm \tan \beta = \frac{sin(\alpha + \beta)}{\cos \alpha \cos \beta} $$
